description:
Defeat the cold and keep running with these pants. Featuring a fully brushed interior for warmth, reflective elements for visibility, mixed media paneling for wind and water resistance, and 4-way stretch to enhance your movement. Plus, secured front pockets provide storage for your essentials.

  • Brushed Interior adds warmth and comfort when the temperature drops
  • Keep your essentials close and secure with zip pockets designed to hold your belongings during your run
  • Protection from the elements with mixed media paneling that provides resistance against the wind
  • Semi-fitted style that strikes the perfect balance between comfort and functionality
  • 29” inseam
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
name: MPG Frost Mixed Media Cold Weather Slim Leg - Women's
